org.apps8os.trafficsense.util

Class EmailReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apps8os.trafficsense.util.EmailReader

  • public class EmailReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Access an e-mail account via IMAPS.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EmailReader.EmailException
      A generic exception for unrecoverable errors that could happen in this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmailReader

        public EmailReader()

    • Method Detail

      • initMailbox

        public void initMailbox(EmailCredential credential)
                 throws EmailReader.EmailException
        Opens a mailbox. Opens the INBOX of the given e-mail account. Connects to the server using IMAP over SSL (imaps). The name of the folder which email is gotten from is assumed to be INBOX.
        Parameters:
        credential - e-mail credential.
        Throws:
        EmailReader.EmailException

      • getNextEmail

        public Email getNextEmail()
                   throws EmailReader.EmailException
        Gets the next email in the mailbox in descending order from newest to oldest. If end of mailbox reached, a null is returned.
        Returns:
        next e-mail message, null if end of mailbox is reached.
        Throws:
        EmailReader.EmailException

      • getMailboxSize

        public int getMailboxSize()
        Returns the number of emails in the mailbox.
        Returns:

      • setMsgPointer

        public void setMsgPointer(int number)
        Sets the msg pointer to the one defined in the parameter. If the new pointer is less than 1, the pointer is set to 1. If the pointer is greater than the number of emails in the box, the pointer is set to newest message in the box. The oldest message in the box is numbered 1, not 0.
        Parameters:
        number - new pointer

      • refreshMailbox

        public void refreshMailbox()
                    throws EmailReader.EmailException
        Refreshes the mailbox.
        Throws:
        EmailReader.EmailException
